event-desc: You can find the whole event’s schedule here[embed the link to schedule/timeline]. Numbers of workshops from the industry experts, working professionals, experienced developers, CEOs, and more... This is an ocean of knowledge and mindful personalities. Grab the golden opportunity to learn from these great minds. <click here> Workshops starting form <date> and <time>

Opening ceremony of the hackathon is going to be hosted virtually at <platform-name>, on <date> and <time>. We will give a quick welcome to all the participants and give an overview. Links will be shared shortly to join the opening ceremony.
Hackathon will commence on <Date> and will be running for 48 hours
